name: Our Home (Fann)
description:
One week assignment from Prototype Studio, under given prompt "Fun to watch". Aiming to create the feeling of going down the slide. 

Control: A & D for direction, Space to fly, E to pick up stuff. 

Credit:

peachyroyalty , Link:  https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/watercolor-bird-b2c20729dd4a4a89b3ee7cf90a795e46
